name: Ghastly Getaway Dizzy (ZX Spectrum Edition)
description:
ZX Spectrum remake of PC game "Ghastly Getaway Dizzy " (by Pogie) Game made with Dizzy Scripting Engine V1.1.0 (by Hippiman) and DizzyAge Map Editor (by Alexandru Simion)

-------------------- 

Game made for ZX-Spectrum 128K personal computer with TR-DOS system and to play it you must use one of this options:

  1. emulator program (like Spectaculator, Unreal Speccy or ZEsarUS to run it)
  2. original ZX-Spectrum 128K (+2/+3/etc) with DIVMMC
  3. ZX-Spectrum 128K compatible personal computer with TR-DOS support (like Pentgon 128K or ZX-Evolution)
  4. ZX-Next personal computer with ESXDOS installed

--------------------

Story: 

Celebrating their anniversary, Dizzy and Daisy book a night away in a quaint old hotel on the outskirts of Fantasy World.

After nightfall, Dizzy cannot sleep. Lightning flashes outside the window, ghosts howl behind the wall, and the bed with his girlfriend flies around the room.

Help Dizzy find a way out of this horrific hotel before he too becomes a ghostly guest! 

---------------

Creators:
